pr_title: Attach product test execution to existing environment

timeline.message:
Attach product test execution to existing environment

Allow running product tests against environment brought up with `env
up`.

1. start environment with `env up`
2. run tests with `test run`, adding `--attach` parameter

Attach product test execution to existing environment

Allow running product tests against environment brought up with `env
up`.

1. start environment with `env up`
2. run tests with `test run`, adding `--attach` parameter

timeline.bodyText: maybe use it as message to the exception
timeline.author: kokosing

replies.bodyText:
i tend to disagree with this.
if someone uses this w junit4, they should just get unsupported exc
